#Basemap
```{r}
leaflet() %>%
  addProviderTiles("OpenStreetMap.Mapnik")
```
#Points
#How do I make sure that the pop up works?
#Why don't all the maps work?
```{r}
leaflet(quakes.point) %>%
  addProviderTiles("Esri.WorldImagery", group = "Default") %>%
  addProviderTiles("Thunderforest.TransportDark", group = "Dark") %>%
  addProviderTiles("OpenStreetMap.BlackAndWhite", group = "Black&White") %>%
  addLayersControl(
    baseGroups = c("Esri.WorldImagery", "Dark", "Black&White"),
    options = layersControlOptions(collapsed = FALSE)) %>%
  addMarkers(  
    clusterOptions = markerClusterOptions()
)
  
#  addMarkers(~longitude, ~latitude, popup = ~as.character(city), label = ~as.character(city))
```

#Lines
```{r}
leaflet(data = hwinjury.lines) %>%
  addProviderTiles("OpenStreetMap.BlackAndWhite") %>%
  addPolylines(color = "red")
```

#Polygons
```{r}
leaflet(schooldist.poly) %>%
  addProviderTiles("OpenStreetMap.Mapnik") %>%
  addPolygons()
```
#Polygons
#How to fix the choropleth colors?
#How to add a legend?
```{r}
bins <- c(0, 25, 50, 75, 100, Inf)
pal <- colorBin("#f0f0f0","#bdbdbd","#636363", domain = demog.poly$hislat, bins = bins)

leaflet(demog.poly) %>%
  addProviderTiles("OpenStreetMap.Mapnik") %>%
  addPolygons(
    fillColor = ~pal(hislat),
    weight = 2,
    opacity = 1,
    color ="white"
  ) %>%
#  addLegend(position = "topright" , pal = pal, values = demog.poly$hislat, title = "Hispanic/Latinos by County")
```
